  Item 9.01.  Financial Statements and        
              Exhibits                        
                                              
Exhibits are
filed herewith in connection with the
Registration Statement on Form S-3 (File No.
333-221324) filed by Wells Fargo &
Company and Wells Fargo Finance LLC with the
Securities and Exchange Commission.

On July 17, 2020, Wells Fargo &
Company issued the following Medium-Term
Notes, Series T: (i) Notes due January 17,
2023; (ii) Notes due January 17,
2024; (iii) Notes due January 17, 2026; (iv)
Notes due July 17, 2028; (v) Notes due July
17, 2022; (vi) Notes
due July 17, 2024; (vii) Notes due July 17,
2025; and (viii) Notes due January 17, 2029
(collectively, the “Notes”).

The purpose of
this Current Report is to file with the
Securities and Exchange Commission the form of
Note related to each issuance and the opinion
of Faegre Drinker Biddle & Reath LLP regarding
the Notes.
